p: The changes of ACFs number in each group, the primary endpoint, will be compared between the aspirin plus placebo group and the aspirin plus metformin group by the Student t test. The safety, one of the secondary endpoints, will be compared by the chi-square test. The remaining results in the two groups will be compared by the Mann-Whitney U test or the t-test. A P values of <â€‰0.05 will be regarded as indicative of statistical significance. The analysis will be performed using SPSS statistics, version 26 (SPSS, Chicago, IL, USA).
